articles.description: Originally set to expire on January 15th, WarnerMedia has extended its 20 percent sale on six-month, prepaid subscriptions to HBO Max until March 1st, 2021. The math works out to saving around $3 per month.
articles.content:
Saving you just over $3 per month, but you have to prepay for six months of service
If you buy something from a Verge link, Vox Media may earn a commission. See our ethics statement.
